version_description:
Bug Fixes
Universal (iPhone and iPad)

- Enhancements to push notifications

- Other bug fixes

- Design fixes
- Enabled access to news bulletin starting from Nov 1, 2012
Minor enhancements

- New Feature: Potholes reporting; Users can now report pothole locations ”in Lebanon” through the app, and MTV will send a technical team to repair them as soon as possible and will inform them once repaired

- Added Dancing With The Stars section with voting
- Dancing With The Stars voting enhancements

MTV is a leading independent media station in Lebanon and the Arab world.

Features:

- Live

Live 24/7 streaming of "mtv Al Lubnaniya" channel with multiple dynamic bit rates depending on your connection speed.

- News

A huge staff is dedicated to this service in order to provide you with breaking news alerts, in addition to a minute per minute updated news, pushed to your device in form of text, photos and videos.

Covering Lebanese, Arabic and international news.

- Weekly grid

Shows you a list of the entire week's programs sorted by day with their air time and a short video promo describing each one.

- Daily grid

Shows you a list of today's programs with their air time and a short video promo describing each one.

- VOD

Never miss a show again and enjoy exclusive content on our video on demand platform.

With the continue watching feature you can pick up a video where you left off.

A huge archive of programs under your fingertips ready to be played on your demand, including the news bulletins, old shows like the legendary "S.L.Chi" and many more.

- You Report

A unique service that gives you the opportunity to become a reporter.

Take any picture or video on the go or pick one from your stored media then upload it to our premises after adding your description.

We will review your media and then display it with your username in a specially dedicated program.

Thank you and enjoy :-)
Enhancement in the previous Seasons & Live Stream
- Live Stream bug fixed and enhancements
- During Ramadan, you can participate in "Enta adda", a popular game and talk show

- "Enta adda" program icon removed after Ramadan
- Enhancement in push notifications

We’re working on the app experience. The best Entertainment app ever!

We know you have choices. In this release, we made app improvements for the iOS 13 devices.
- Updated News performance to cover COVID-19 Virus Breaking News
- Corona News Performance Updates

- News Slider Functionality update
- API improvements

- Add Picture in Picture support.
- VOD enhancements.
